QuestData.Title: Keep Them off the Front
QuestData.Description: Oh good, you brought another catapult with you! Clay might be older than dirt, but he makes a mean war machine.$B$BWell, you didn't bring it all the way out here for your health, flesh bag. Get in one of those things and bombard the fungal terrors and reinforcements streaming out of Needlerock Slag.$B$BWe have to keep them off the front!
QuestData.LogDescription: Bombard 30 Fungal Terrors and/or Stone Trogg Reinforcements.
QuestData.CompletionText: Get back in a catapult and put those things back in the ground. The line's barely holding!
QuestData.RewardText: That's a great start, $n, but we're going to need you to fly over into the town and stir up some trouble.
